allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Stock Ichimoku Cloud Analysis Tool

- Add main Python script for stock data download and analysis
- Implement Ichimoku Cloud chart generation with candlesticks
- Add automated trading signal analysis
- Include JSON configuration for 25 stocks \(US + Danish\)
- Generate comprehensive trading reports
- Add README with usage instructions
- Add requirements.txt for dependencies

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
